sourcesContent:
function Work() { return (

MaXentric Technologies, LLC - Incoming Software Innovator Intern

June 2022 - September 2022

  • More will be added soon! Stay tuned!

This is my first internship and I’m really excited to find out about what work in industry looks like!

UCSD CSE - CSE Tutor

September 2021 - June 2022

  • Taught difficult fundamental programming concepts such as functions, loopss, and basic data structures efficiently to 1000+ students through communicating clearly and concisely
  • Helped students learn how to debug by debugging their code and demonstrating how to use tools such as coompilers, debuggers, and testing frameworks
  • Worked closely with other tutors and the professor to design strategies such as review sessions, and group tickets to better provide help to the students

For all of my second year (the 2021-22 school year) at UCSD, I enjoyed working part time as a tutor for the CSE 8A and CSE 12 courses taught by Professor Paul Cao. Being a tutor certainly has been an amazingly rewarding experience, and I feel it especially in the moments where I see the students’ eyes light up with understanding. It is so fulfilling to know that I was able to help someone in that moment and it is a source of great inspiration to keep going. I have been and will continue to be really grateful to have this opportunity to help others and am glad to have put several hours every week towards this end. Every week, I am reminded to be more thoughtful and open minded, to be kind and helpful no matter how I feel that day, and I believe that this has really helped me grow.

) } export default Work;
